collections.name: Big 4 Teams
collections.description: The four most successful teams in Greek football history - Panathinaikos, AEK Athens, PAOK, and Olympiacos. These teams have dominated Greek football for decades and have the largest fan bases in the country.

collections.name: Athens Teams
collections.description: Football clubs based in Athens and surrounding areas. The capital city is home to many historic clubs including Panathinaikos, AEK Athens, and several other teams from the greater Athens area.

collections.name: Thessaloniki Teams
collections.description: Football clubs from Thessaloniki and northern Greece. The second largest city in Greece has a rich football tradition with teams like PAOK and Aris Thessaloniki.

collections.name: Super League Classic
collections.description: Traditional teams that have been part of the Greek Super League for many years. These clubs represent the backbone of Greek football with rich histories and loyal fan bases.

collections.name: Greek Cup Winners
collections.description: Teams that have won the Greek Cup multiple times throughout their history. The Greek Cup is one of the most prestigious domestic competitions in Greek football.
